column2: -99.11776806052671 Legend of the Callejón del Muerto http://antiq.wiki/?s23-l790 An Archbishop
column3: on his way home from Basilica Santa Maria was the first to see the ghost of Don Tristan. Having failed in life to fulfill a vow to walk barefoot to the Blessed Virgin's shrine after she saved his son from illness; Don Tristan made the journey immediately after death.

column2: -99.13293935561404 Francisco and Antonio - los Parados http://antiq.wiki/?s23-l2374 In the Calle de los Parados
column4: Don Francisco Puerto y Solis and Señor Don Antonio Miguel del Cardonal
column5: continue to futilely wait on street corners for Doña María Ysabel
column6: even after her untimely death from a pestilence. Unaware of her passing
column7: they steadfastly maintained their vigil in life and death
column8: becoming part of the legend that still shadows the street today.

column2: -9.53252221237908 Youthful Prince O'Donoghue the Prophet http://antiq.wiki/?s22-l9880 Prince O’Donoghue
column3: famed for wisdom and eternal youth
column4: vanished during a feast at Ross Castle by walking out across the lake and sinking beneath its waters. Each May Day he is said to reappear on a white horse with a radiant retinue
column5: a vision believed to foretell a plentiful harvest.

column2: -0.8797238923049998 The Ghostly Bishop of Fingest http://antiq.wiki/?s20-l665 Bishop Burghersh of Fingest
column3: known for his tyrannical behavior and land theft during his lifetime
column4: is said to haunt the village of Fingest
column5: seeking to return the stolen land for peace in death. The ghostly bishop roams the fields
column6: pleading for the land to be restored to its rightful owners
column7: as the villagers and subsequent landholders continue to ignore his restless spirit.

column2: -0.7796421077457261 The Ghost of Bisham Abbey http://antiq.wiki/?s20-l931 The ghost of Lady Hobby haunts Bisham Abbey
column3: unable to find peace after having beaten her son
column5: to death centuries ago for not keeping his schoolwork neat. Her spirit is a curious site
column6: appearing with reversed colors and constantly trying to wash her hands in a basin she can never reach
